metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Battle Champion Iris is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Battle Champion Iris has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Mixolydian,  and G Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
